sentences.sContent: She wandered aimlessly about the house.
sentences.sCn: 她漫无目的地在房子里走来走去。

sentences.sContent: Ana wandered off to get a drink.
sentences.sCn: 安娜溜达着去弄了一杯喝的。

sentences.sContent: He was found wandering the streets of New York.
sentences.sCn: 有人看到他在纽约街头游荡。

sentences.sContent: ...has reduced our appetite for aimless adventures no longer have we the inclination to let ourselves wander through tields of knowledges...

remMethod.val: 徘徊(wander)在十字路口， 想知道(wonder)如何选择

words.tran: 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的
流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

trans.tranCn: 漫游， 闲逛， 漫步； 偏离正道； 走神， 恍惚
trans.tranOther: to walk slowly across or around an area, usually without a clear direction or purpose
